songs.title: 1-Luv
songs.lyrics:
1 Luv
I  am humble
I  am machine
A media
Black and the brown rat pack
Who  wanna see us?
A   convict
Gracias
Homies  ashantes
These haters
I’m gonna pull them
Dumping the diamantes

Love  to my essays
A body on my hobbles
You know I come from Compton
Where them killers got no squabbles
Hit him in the head with a two piece
Hit him to his baubles
Caught a homie’s  toking
While I’m smoking on a bauble


I don’t understand it
This bullshit  they hand us
Can’t you niggas see that this is all propaganda?
Money needs friends
We ain’t the minority
All colored people
That mean we the majority
They sponsor the genocide
Want to make us monsters
Once we at each other’s throats
They divide and they conqueor
Controlled by the deal
Black as fuck
We need peace in these streets
Nigga that’s the stuff


1 luv
Pounds in the backs
1 luv
It’s for my essays Crips and Bloods
1 soul
1 luv
Stop the killers in the hood
That’s enough
That’s all
1 luv
It’s about the children
Not about us

Yeah
I get down with the black and the brown
No more we divided we united
So it’s happening now
Gotta let these motherfuckers know
We smarter than that
Me and the loc gang
All about the sparking the gap
Why should I pull my shank
And shank your ass
Crip bloods straight thugs
But we all real gangstas
Keep letting bullets fly
We all die
Increase the peace
We stay alive
And multiply
And get this money
Till we all on top
These truths so
We all  live on
And won’t stop
Got rised up and all bit
In the state penitentiary
Better come together
Cause we got a common enemy
Versus the boys in blue
They treat us
The same way they treating you
So wake up
Divided we fall
But united we stand
Let’s all cock back
And aim right at the man


1 luv
Pounds in the backs
1 luv
It’s for my essays Crips and Bloods
1 soul
1 luv
Stop the killers in the hood
That’s enough
That’s all
1 luv
It’s about the children
Not about us


From the hollow wars in the pens
And infested tthe street
We need to stand together
Stop this black and brown beef
From my mind to my mouth
To the peopel
It’s all about 1-luv
See we all pretty equal
I got one God, one world, one womb
Brought me to life
To be taken by another?
Who the fuck gives you the right

It’s a damn shame
How this world done got
Simple drama in the block
Will get your wig popped out
Damn
What ever happened
To those old school ways
How a  loast
We used to post
Out on the corner
Getting blazed
Sipping on a 40
And not giving a fuck
Nowadays you watching your back
From getting shot
Or stuck
It’s bad enough
The law trying to keep me down
You fucked if you black
You deported if you brown
Recognize that I’m a native
The white man is on a passport
Check yourself
Before you grew up
And beat that ass

1 luv
Pounds in the backs
1 luv
It’s for my essays Crips and Bloods
1 soul
1 luv
Stop the killers in the hood
That’s enough
That’s all
1 luv
It’s about the children
Not about us
